name: Free Range (davisarthur)
description:
This is my first "finished" game! It is still missing a lot (title screen, music, animations, debugging, etc.), but I had a lot of fun making it, and wanted to wrap it up in time to submit to "My First Game Jam: Summer 2021." Thank you to anyone who plays "Free Range," and good luck to everyone else entering in the jam!

Credit:

All of the artwork and animations in this game were downloaded for free online from the following sources:

3D Nature Art Pack - Kenney

Chicken, Low Poly, Cute - LB3D

Easy Primitive People - Bit Gamey

Simple Collectables Pack - Dillon Wallace
